A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's an excellent movie. Sure there are some things I would have liked to be done differently\, but all in all it changed the way Star Wars works and ensured we won't have another original trilogy parallel. It was exciting and kept me on the edge of my seat throughout\, there was no plot armor and it was incredible acting on part of the cast\, especially Mark Hamill and Daisy.
